job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pWe are looking for a machine learning engineer with a mastery of AWS training and deploying models lambdas and endpointsppbrppTo succeed in this role you should possess outstanding skills in machine learning methods and statisticsppbrppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpulliCreate implement and train machine learning modelsliliClean and structure dataliliCreate and test hypothesesliliTrain the developed models to run evaluative experiments to refine models and increase accuracyliliRemain updated in the rapidly changing field of machine learningliulpbrppstrongRequirementsstrongpulliStrong command of structured and unstructured data preparationliliMastercommander of PythonliliMastery of AWSliliExperience in relational and nonrelational databases eg dynamoDB mySQLliliDegree in Computer Science Mathematics Statistics Computational Linguistics or similar fieldliliAt least 2 years of experience in a strongnonacademicstrong production roleliliThe ability to meet agreed upon deadlines and responsibilitiesliulpbrppstrongDesirablestrongpulliAn analytical mind with problemsolving abilitiesliliStrong communication skillsliulpbrppstrongInterview Processstrongpp1 Google meet interview 1015 minpp2 check your referencespp3 takehome project 1hrpp3 Google Meet interview 2030minppbrppstrongCompensationstrongppJob Type FulltimeppPay 9000000  15000000 per yearp
